answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!First of all rule out medical causes such as hypothyroidism and diabetes. If this is fine, then drink plenty of water, eat lots of fresh fruits and vegetables and take goo care of your hair and skin. Exercise regularly in fresh air. Eat less of junk food. Once the skin tone and muscle tone is maintained, looks will improve.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: Dear Sir,I am now 39yrs old, but people often told me that I am looked older than my actual age by 5/7yrs. I also realise the same that I am looked older than my actual age. What is cause of it ? Is there is any way to look me younger of my actual age or lower ? Sometime I feel embresses when someone state or resemble my age to a person 5/7 yrs senior to me. Sir, please give a way.Thanks.with regards.DIFREE1970
title: Looking older than actual age
